Articles.Content: So I did a quick search and a few mods came up but the ones I want are outdated now. I'm looking for a mod that gives more realistic sounding rocket engines, very much like this: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/53800-RELEASED-A-R-P-mod-%28-Audio-Replacement-Project-%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/53800-RELEASED-A-R-P-mod-%28-Audio-Replacement-Project-%29). Unfortunately it's outdated which kinda sucks given that it looks very promising! Anyone have any ideas for this type of mod?

[Hot Rockets](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/65754-HotRockets!-Particle-FX-Replacement-Tutorial)

It has improved sounds I think., of course if you don't like the rocket effects, that might be problematic.

Also [RCS Sound](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/52896-0-90-RCS-Sound-%28and-light!%29-Effects-%282015-02-01%29)
